page.title: 14CARAVAN PARK-HOLKER MOSS
page.content: There is a fairly large caravan site situated in some old quarry workings on the east side of the B5278. The site has provision for over 100 caravans including 80 static caravans and at least 30 touring caravans. The site has a small toilet block with washing facilities and an office building with a shop and an inquiries desk. The caravan site is split up into several individual emplacements and it stretches for some distance towards Bigland Tarn. Much of the wooded area around the site is well footpathed and sign- posted and kept in good order for the tourists.It is an attractive and isolated area for walking and observing the wild-life.
